inventory_items: traffic cone that makes you think you're William Shakespeare
non_lethal_events: {person} scouts the cornucopia from afar.
{person} eats dirt.
{person} reinforces a hidden bunker.
{person} stalks distant footsteps but loses the trail.
{person} hides beneath branches as distant screams echo.
{person} drinks from a muddy stream and hopes it’s safe.
{person} accidentally gives away their position and quickly relocates.
{person} quietly reinforces their camp, listening for movement in the trees.
{person} follows a trail of footprints but turns back when they suddenly vanish.
{person} climbs a tree to scout the area and nearly slips.
{person} builds a crude alarm system using sticks and stones.
{person} collects rainwater in a leaf-lined pit.
{person} studies the terrain, searching for defensible ground.
{person} hears rustling nearby and freezes until it fades.
{person} creates decoy tracks to confuse anyone following them.
{person} rests briefly, keeping their eyes on the treeline.
{person} sharpens their senses by listening to distant echoes.
{person} inspects a set of claw marks carved into a tree.
{person} marks a safe path with small piles of stones.
{person} debates with a squirrel for dominance of a log. The squirrel wins.
{person} dramatically rolls behind a rock… even though nobody is around.
{person} mistakes a bush for an enemy and apologizes to it.
{person} delivers a motivational speech to themselves and feels slightly better.
{person} waves at a sponser drone, hoping for snacks.
{person} trips over nothing, pretends it was part of a tactical maneuver.
{person} practices battle poses in case cameras are watching.
{person} whispers threats to a tree, which remains unimpressed.

non_lethal_events.text: {person} plots quietly with {ally} and {rival} deep into the night.
{person} negotiates an uneasy truce with {ally} while keeping an eye on {traitor}.
{person} follows {rival}.
{person} whispers plans with {ally}, keeping a close ear on {rival}'s movements.
{person} and {ally} search for supplies together but nearly walk into {rival}.
{person} shadows {rival}, only to realize {ally} has been shadowing them both.
{person} forms a brief alliance with {ally}, though both side-eye {traitor} the entire time.
{person}, {ally}, and {rival} all reach for the same water source and awkwardly pretend they weren’t.
{person} convinces {ally} to work together, but {rival} loudly mocks their teamwork.
{person} sneaks up on {rival}, only to find {ally} also sneaking up on {rival}.
{person} and {ally} discover footprints belonging to {rival}, sparking a silent chase.
{person} mediates a tense argument between {ally} and {rival}.
{person} tries to trick {rival}, but {ally} ruins the plan by laughing too loudly.
{person} and {rival} lock eyes from across a clearing until {ally} ruins the moment by tripping.
{person} walks into {ally} and {rival} arguing. They quietly walk back out.
{person}, {ally}, and {rival} silently agree to not talk about the weird noise they just heard.
{person}, {ally}, and {rival} stare at each other for a solid minute before all walking away in different directions.
{person} waves awkwardly at {other} before hiding behind a tree.
{person} confidently approaches {other} to say something intimidating, but sneezes mid-sentence.
{person} tries to impress {other} by flexing, but pulls a muscle immediately.
{person} and {other} share a quiet conversation about home, finding comfort in each other's presence.
{person} walks beside {other} in peaceful silence, their steps naturally falling into the same rhythm.
{person} offers {other} a small, hand-made token of kindness, and {other} accepts it with a soft smile.

lethal_events: {killer} strangles {victim} to death.
{killer} pushes {victim} into a ravine.
{killer} outmatches {victim} after a tense duel.
{victim} hikes through the trees and is sniped from afar by {killer}
{killer} overwhelms {victim} during a close-quarters fight.
{killer} crushes {victim} with a boulder from above.
{killer} unleashes a swarm of tracker jackers on {victim}, killing them.
{killer} pushes {victim} into a pit of spike traps.
{killer} chloroforms {victim} with improvised chemicals.
{killer} slams {victim} into a tree until the forest goes quiet.
{victim} couldn't take it anymore.
{killer}はすばやいひといきで{victim}をしとめた。
{killer} dropkicks {victim} into a tree with unbelievable force.
{killer} pushes {victim} off a narrow ridge while pretending it was an accident.
{killer} startles {victim}, who runs straight into a deadly trap.
{killer} kills and eats {victim}
{killer} suplexes {victim} so hard the arena briefly loses gravity.
{killer} screams at {victim}. The volume vaporizes them instantly.
{killer} drops a pinecone on {victim}. The pinecone explodes like a grenade.
{victim} and {killer} agree to a duel, {killer} wins.
{killer} drops from the trees onto {victim}, ending them instantly.

lethal_events.text: {killer} launches explosives that wipe out {victim} and {victim2}.
{killer} detonates a trap, taking out {victim} and {victim2}.

inventory_events: {person} finds a way to cure their wounds with their {item}.
{person} flashes a {item} to ward off pursuers.
{person} retools a {item} into something even more dangerous.
{person} cleans and maintains their {item}, preparing for nightfall.
{person} experiments with their {item}, hoping it becomes useful.
{person} sharpens their {item} on a flat stone.
{person} hides their {item} beneath leaves so no one can steal it.
{person} nearly breaks their {item} while messing around with it.
{person} taps their {item} rhythmically to stay calm.
{person} fashions a crude tool using their {item}.
{person} defends their camp by placing their {item} at the entrance.
{person} uses their {item} to test if a path is safe.
{person} upgrades their {item} using scraps found nearby.
{person} meditates while holding their {item}, gathering their resolve.
loot_events: {person} scavenges a {item} from the Cornucopia wreckage.
{person} digs up a buried stash and pockets a {item}.
{person} slips a {item} into their pack unnoticed.
{person} opens a package from a sponser and recieves a {item}
{person} discovers a supply crate and retrieves a {item}.
{person} lifts a {item} from a careless tribute’s camp.
{person} follows a sponser drone and steals a dropped {item}.
{person} finds a waterproof box with a {item} inside.
{person} finds a backpack washed up on a stream bank with a {item} inside.

herb bundle: {person} kneels by a patch of greenery and comes away with a fragrant herb bundle.
{person} snips a handful of herbs and wraps them carefully for later.
Taco Bell Meal Deal: {person} finds a pristine Taco Bell Meal Deal still warm from the sponsers.
rubber chicken: {person} finds a rubber chicken and questions their luck.
poetry anthology: {person} is gifted a poetry anthology from their sponser.
With sudden inspiration, {person} writes a beautiful poetry anthology
traffic cone that makes you think you're: {person} unearths a humble traffic cone, yet upon touching it, their mind is seized by the spirit of William Shakespearee himself.
{person} beholds a traffic cone lying in the dust; as they lift it, a sudden tempest of poetic genius floods their thoughts.
popcorn: {person} recieves some popcorn from a sponser.
{person} finds a microwave and some unpopped popcorn
Hunting Knife: {person} retrieves a hunting knife from the Cornucopia floor, its blade still gleaming.
{person} digs through debris and uncovers a sturdy hunting knife.
Flint & Steel: {person} picks up a set of flint and steel wrapped in cloth.
{person} discovers flint and steel tucked beneath a broken crate.
Water Canteen: {person} finds a dented but usable water canteen.
{person} scoops up a metal canteen half-buried in the mud.
Small First-Aid Kit: {person} grabs a compact first-aid kit from a sponser drop.
{person} uncovers a dusty first-aid kit hidden under loose gravel.
Coiled Rope: {person} slings a coil of rope over their shoulder after retrieving it from the Cornucopia.
{person} finds a length of rope tangled around tree roots.
Weatherproof Cloak: {person} pulls on a weatherproof cloak lined with coarse fabric.
{person} retrieves a rugged cloak from a sponser crate.

{victim} and {victim2} never see the {item} that {person} left behind.
{person} hurls a {item} straight into {victim}.
{person} stalks {victim} with a {item} and doesn't miss.
{person} fans blades so fast that {victim} and {victim2} both fall.

special_item_events.item: traffic cone that makes you think you're William Shakespeare
events: {person}, now convinced they are the Bard reborn, doth place the {item} upon their head like a crown and proclaims, 'Hark! A new play begins!'
{person} wanders the arena clutching the {item}, reciting verses unknown to mortal ears.

events.text: Inspired by the {item}, {person} delivers a tragic soliloquy so profound that {victim} stands entranced - till {person} strikes them down with eloquence.
{person}, channeling the fury of a thousand sonnets, commands the {item} as though it were a royal scepter and smites {victim} with theatrical flourish.
With grand Shakespearean bravado, {person} challenges {victim} and {victim2} to a duel of words, yet ends the contest with steel instead.

events: {person} pauses mid-battle to narrate their own tale, the {item} held aloft: 'Forsooth, Act III shall not be my end!'
